name: Black Rifle Coffee Company
description: Black Rifle Coffee Company (BRCC) is a veteran-owned coffee company that specializes in premium coffee and is committed to serving those who love America. Founded in 2014 by former Green Beret Evan Hafer, BRCC aims to provide high-quality coffee while supporting military veterans and first responders. The company sources its coffee beans from around the world, ensuring that each blend delivers exceptional flavor and quality. With a strong emphasis on community and patriotism, BRCC not only sells coffee but also engages in various charitable initiatives, including support for veterans, first responders, and active-duty military personnel. The brand has gained a loyal following, particularly among those who appreciate its strong stance on freedom and individual rights. Through its online store, BRCC offers a wide range of products, including whole bean coffee, ground coffee, single-serve pods, and branded merchandise. The company also operates retail locations and participates in events that promote its mission and values. As part of its commitment to giving back, BRCC allocates a portion of its profits to organizations that directly support veteran causes. With its robust marketing strategies and strong brand identity, Black Rifle Coffee Company has positioned itself as a leader in the specialty coffee market while fostering a sense of camaraderie among coffee lovers and patriots alike.
